question: 応援する
sourceAnswer: To Root For, To Cheer On, To Cheer For
sourceMnemonic: <ja>応援</ja> is <kanji>aid</kanji> and <kanji>root for</kanji>, but for this verb the "root for" one is going to be more on the money. You can call this <vocabulary>to root for</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to cheer on</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to cheer for</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>応援</ja>. It's also just the on'yomi readings you learned.
